title: Wild Animals of the North
description: The first in a series of illustrated books covering animals of the world, North: Animals of the Wild features Dieter Braunâ€™s beautiful drawings of northern animals accompanied by fun facts and clever descriptions that children will love!From the polar bears of the Arctic to the North American pumas and pandas in Asia, North: Animals of the Wild takes children on an exciting journey of discovery. The stunning and accurate drawings show these animals in all their natural majesty and the witty and charming descriptions will teach children all about their new favorite animals!Dieter Braun is a freelance illustrator and children's book author from Hamburg, Germany.
author: Dieter Braun
